subdisciplines.name: Political Ecology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the interactions between political, economic, and environmental factors.

subdisciplines.name: Political Economy
subdisciplines.description: The study of the relationships between politics and economics.

subdisciplines.name: Political Sociology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the social and cultural aspects of politics.

subdisciplines.name: Political Psychology
subdisciplines.description: The study of psychological influences on political behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Comparative Politics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the similarities and differences between political systems.
